description:
Wonderfully comfortable GORE-TEX trekking boot built for a wider forefoot with clever details and a lightweight, yet stable construction.

Roll on the mountains! Whether hut-to-hut treks or day hikes, the Tatra II Wide is a versatile boot that is a pleasure to hike in. Comfort is the name of the game – from the sure-grip Vibram® sole tread via the comfortable footbed to the intelligent lacing and soft, leather cuff. The Wide Version has a standard heel, but is wider at the forefoot and ball of the foot. Say goodbye to pressure points. And the GORE-TEX lining keeps your feet dry in wet conditions.
name: HanWag Tatra II, Wide - Mens
